data.title: Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy moves billions in Bitcoin
data.description: The world's leading Bitcoin (BTC) treasury company, MicroStrategy (Nasdaq: MSTR), now rebranded to Strategy, has been moving billions in BTC. Led by co-founder and executive chairman Michael Saylor, Strategy is a software company that began accumulating Bitcoin in 2020. Now, it is the ...
data.keywords: Michael Saylor, MicroStrategy, Morgan Stanley Capital International, Fidelity Custody
